Augment.Name: Magnetism +78
Augment.Description: Magnetism +78: +78 Equipment bonus to Electric spell power.

Augment.Name: Corrosion +78
Augment.Description: Corrosion +78: +78 Equipment bonus to Acid spell power.

Augment.Name: Combustion +78
Augment.Description: Combustion +78: +78 Equipment bonus to Fire spell power.

Augment.Name: Glaciation +78
Augment.Description: Glaciation +78: +78 Equipment bonus to Cold spell power.

Augment.Name: Nullification +78
Augment.Description: Nullification +78: +78 Equipment bonus to Negative and Poison spell power.

Augment.Name: Devotion +78
Augment.Description: Devotion +78: +78 Equipment bonus to Positive spell power.

Augment.Name: Shocking Burst
Augment.Description: Shocking Burst: This weapon is sheathed in crackling electricity, and deals 1 to 6 electric damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 electric damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.

Augment.Name: Acid Burst
Augment.Description: Acid Burst: This weapon is sheathed in corrosive acid, and does 1 to 6 acid damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 acid damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.

Augment.Name: Flaming Burst
Augment.Description: Flaming Burst: This weapon is sheathed in fire, and deals 1 to 6 fire damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 fire damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.

Augment.Name: Icy Burst
Augment.Description: Icy Burst: This weapon is sheathed in icy cold, and deals 1 to 6 cold damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 cold damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.

Augment.Name: Unholy Burst
Augment.Description: Unholy Burst: An unholy weapon is imbued with unholy power. This power makes the weapon evil-aligned and thus bypasses the corresponding damage reduction. It deals an extra 2 to 12 points of damage against all of good alignment and an extra 3 to 18 on a critical for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 4 to 24 for a x3 multiplier, and 5 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.

Augment.Name: Holy Burst
Augment.Description: Holy Burst: A holy weapon is imbued with holy power. This power makes the weapon good-aligned and thus bypasses the corresponding damage reduction. It deals an extra 2 to 12 points of damage against all of evil alignment and an extra 3 to 18 on a critical for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 4 to 24 for a x3 multiplier, and 5 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.

Augment.Name: Insightful Charisma +2
Augment.Description: Insightful Charisma +2: +2 Insight bonus to Charisma

Augment.Name: Insightful Wisdom +2
Augment.Description: Insightful Wisdom +2: +2 Insight bonus to Wisdom

Augment.Name: Insightful Intelligence +2
Augment.Description: Insightful Intelligence +2: +2 Insight bonus to Intelligence

Augment.Name: Insightful Dexterity +2
Augment.Description: Insightful Dexterity +2: +2 Insight bonus to Dexterity

Augment.Name: Insightful Constitution +2
Augment.Description: Insightful Constitution +2: +2 Insight bonus to Constitution

Augment.Name: Insightful Strength +2
Augment.Description: Insightful Strength +2: +2 Insight bonus to Strength

Augment.Name: Heightened Awareness +2
Augment.Description: Heightened Awareness +2: This item helps you to quickly read situations with sharpness and clarity, allowing you to predict actions before they occur. You gain a +2 Insight bonus to AC.

Augment.Name: +15% Electrical Absorption
Augment.Description: Electrical Absorption +15%: Passive: +15% Equipment Bonus to Electrical Absorption.

Augment.Name: +15% Acid Absorption
Augment.Description: Acid Absorption +15%: Passive: +15% Equipment Bonus to Acid Absorption.

Augment.Name: +15% Fire Absorption
Augment.Description: Fire Absorption +15%: Passive: +15% Equipment Bonus to Fire Absorption.

Augment.Name: +15% Cold Absorption
Augment.Description: Cold Absorption +15%: Passive: +15% Equipment Bonus to Cold Absorption.

Augment.Name: +20% Negative Absorption
Augment.Description: Negative Absorption +20%: Passive: +20% Equipment Bonus to Negative Absorption.

Augment.Name: +40 Healing Amplification
Augment.Description: Healing Amplification +40: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by +40 (Equipment bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
